General.Name: MetaTech AP
General.Description: MetaTech (AP) Inc. engages in the wholesale and retail of electronic products and equipment in Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, and Singapore. It also engages in the research and development, and production of cells; development and operation of biomedicine related business; and travel business. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 75, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
